_instructions: 1. Copy this file and rename to settings_v2_3.json
2. Replace SERVER with your actual server name
3. Update paths to match your network share locations
4. Ensure all users have read/write access to the db_path location
5. All users must use the SAME db_path to share data
_notes: Database supports 2-3 concurrent users safely, up to 10 users total
SQLite with WAL mode is used for better concurrent access
For more than 10 users, consider upgrading to SQL Server or PostgreSQL
Network paths must use double backslashes in JSON format
UNC paths (\\SERVER\Share) are recommended over mapped drives
